text: Savitribai Deshmukh (died c. 1680-1690), better known by her title Rai Bagan or Raibagan (, lit. "Royal Tigress"), was a female Mughal general under the Mughal Emperor, Aurangzeb. She was the widow of the Mughal sardar Raje Udaram Deshmukh of Mahur jagir in Deccan. Category:Indian generals Category:1680s deaths
title: Rai Bagan
